edge: Belonged to Bellatrix Lestrange and Draco Malfoy, wandmaker Ollivander senses Draco's wand has changed its allegiance to Harry Potter.
Trapped by security while trying to escape from Gringotts bank after breaking into Bellatrix Lestrange's vault at Gringotts bank.
Released the dragon guardian and fled Gringotts bank on its back while trying to escape from Gringotts bank after breaking into Bellatrix Lestrange's vault at Gringotts bank.
Harry Potter has a vision of Lord Voldemort at Gringotts during the plot details.
Harry realises that Voldemort's snake Nagini is the final Horcrux
Voldemort tells Snape that the Elder Wand cannot serve Voldemort until Snape dies; Nagini then viciously attacks Snape
Following her death, Snape worked with Albus Dumbledore as a double agent amongst the Death Eaters, to protect Harry from Voldemort
Snape despised Harry's late father James, who bullied him, but he loved Harry's mother Lily
causal relation, Snape conjured the Patronus doe
accidental relation, Harry became an Horcrux by accident
informational relation, Voldemort's curse originally failed to kill Harry
informational relation, Dumbledore's spirit meets Harry
causal relation, Neville draws the Sword of Gryffindor from the Sorting Hat in defiance
final confrontation and killing relation, Harry finally kills Voldemort after his Expelliarmus charm...
informational relation, Voldemort never commanded the Elder Wand
